title: HJC RPHA 11 Pro Carbon
features: Premium Integrated Matrix (P.I.M. Plus) Carbon Fiber shell
Extremely lightweight design for track use
MultiCool antibacterial interior, moisture-wicking and quick drying

product_details.description: The RPHA 11 Pro Carbon stands at the top of HJC's lineup, featuring a full carbon fiber shell that delivers extreme lightness and superior impact resistance. Designed for the track but street-legal, it provides massive airflow and uncompromising safety.
